items.content_html: encrypt-cookiejs is a lightweight JavaScript package designed to securely manage data in browser cookies using advanced encryption techniques. This package ensures that sensitive data stored in cookies is encrypted, providing a higher level of security for client-side storage
items.title: abfahimb/encrypt-cookieJS: encrypt-cookiejs is a lightweight JavaScript package designed to securely manage data in browser cookies using advanced encryption techniques. This package ensures that sensitive data stored in cookies is encrypted, providing a higher level of security for client-side storage

items.content_html: A web-based IPTV playlist manager with multi-URL support, real-time validation, and smart filtering. Features include M3U/JSON import/export, automatic URL failover, and tag-based filtering. Built with vanilla JavaScript and Bootstrap for a lightweight, responsive experience.
items.title: rafikb/M3U_Manager-v3:  A web-based IPTV playlist manager with multi-URL support, real-time validation, and smart filtering. Features include M3U/JSON import/export, automatic URL failover, and tag-based filtering. Built with vanilla JavaScript and Bootstrap for a lightweight, responsive experience.

items.content_html: A lightweight tool that monitors the availability of a given URL, instantly notifying the user if the URL is online or offline. This tool is ideal for users needing simple, real-time uptime monitoring for websites or web services. Customizable check intervals and easy-to-use interface.
items.title: dilshodturabov/isurlworking: A lightweight tool that monitors the availability of a given URL, instantly notifying the user if the URL is online or offline. This tool is ideal for users needing simple, real-time uptime monitoring for websites or web services. Customizable check intervals and easy-to-use interface.

items.content_html: utility that provides seamless PostgreSQL client management for both development and production environments. In development, it utilizes an in-memory PostgreSQL instance for fast, lightweight testing and schema initialization using pg-mem.

items.content_html: X-UI is a lightweight, user-friendly web panel designed for managing Xray configurations. Ideal for personal use, it streamlines the process of managing server configurations, making it accessible for everyone.

items.content_html: The Vanilla Calendar Pro is a versatile JavaScript date and time picker component with TypeScript support, making it compatible with any JavaScript frameworks and libraries. It is designed to be lightweight, easy to use, and feature-rich, without relying on external dependencies.
items.title: uvarov-frontend/vanilla-calendar-pro: The Vanilla Calendar Pro is a versatile JavaScript date and time picker component with TypeScript support, making it compatible with any JavaScript frameworks and libraries. It is designed to be lightweight, easy to use, and feature-rich, without relying on external dependencies.
